title: Chapter 4530 - Chapter 4530: Under The Fear Of The Four Mighty Ones
body:
Chapter 4530 - Chapter 4530: Under The Fear Of The Four Mighty Ones

Chapter 4530: Under the fear of the four mighty ones

“Boom! Boom! Boom!”

The three great dao-level mighty ones from the evil sequence faction locked their eyes on Wang Xian.

They waved their arms and waves of extremely powerful energy attacked Wang Xian.

“Hehe, are you looking down on me? Although I haven’t recovered to my peak, it shouldn’t be a problem for me to crush all of you one-on-one.”

When the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens saw the evil sequence faction and the three primal chaos level existences attacking Wang Xian, his face was filled with a cold expression.

He flapped his enormous wings and went straight for the powerhouse whose head was connected by countless tentacles.

The towering flames turned into Firebirds that possessed the power to destroy the world.

Buzz! Buzz

The moment the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens rushed out.

All the buildings in the entire Dragon Palace were emitting a wave of energy.

All the energy connected together to form a huge net that covered the sky.

The buildings in the Dragon Palace were comparable to fifteen ultimate treasures of the Heaven’s origin!

What was the concept of fifteen ultimate treasures of the Heaven’s origin?

This was a power that could suppress existences who had just stepped into the chaos realm.

In particular, these 15 heaven origin destiny-level treasures were personally forged by Wang Xian. Their energy could resonate.

They could release a huge net together.

This huge net covered the surroundings of the Dragon Palace. All enemies could trap it instantly.

Even existences who had just stepped into the chaos level could be trapped instantly.

The Nine Heavens Divine Roc locked onto an expert from the evil sequence camp.

The Dragon Palace’s net was heading toward a chaos-level existence!

At this moment, the three chaos-level existences from the evil sequence faction were stunned.

Whether it was the Nine Heavens Divine Roc or the sky-shrouding net, these waves of energy weren’t weaker than their own.

In fact, they were even stronger.

The sky-shrouding net was heading toward sword demon axe!

“What?”

Sensing the power coming from the Dragon Palace, the four chaos-level existences in the evil sequence faction were completely stunned!

They were all shocked!

They dared to attack the Dragon Palace and destroy the Dragon Palace Alliance.

It was because according to the information they had received, the Dragon Palace only had one chaos-level existence.

As long as they destroyed it, the entire land of origin would be theirs.

However, the strength displayed by the Dragon Palace had shocked them.

The strength displayed by the Dragon Palace alone was not weaker than theirs.

“How is this possible? How can the Dragon Palace be so strong?”

The six great dao-level existences from the evil sequence faction, the spirit kneader, and the rest looked at the Dragon Palace in shock.

“Hehe, leave the two of you to me!”

Wang Xian locked his gaze on the old man with the bamboo hat and moved.

Under the coverage of the time domain, he instantly arrived in front of the old man with the bamboo hat.

At this moment, the powerhouse with the bamboo hat had the same fear as the Lord of disaster.

His speed was too fast.

It was so fast that even chaos-level existences like them couldn’t react in time.

This was terrifying!

His bamboo hat formed a sea of blood and swept towards Wang Xian.

It completely enveloped the surrounding area and launched a large-scale attack.

Thump

Wang Xian condensed the power of chaos into a long spear and pierced forward.

The terrifying power penetrated the sea of blood and landed in front of the old man in the bamboo hat.

When the old man with the bamboo hat saw this scene, his pupils constricted slightly and a look of astonishment appeared on his face.

His body instantly distorted, and the long spear that was supposed to pierce through his head directly pierced through one of his arms.

Even so, his entire arm instantly dissipated!

“Help me, I’m not his match. This Dragon King’s strength is too terrifying!”

The old man with the bamboo hat was terrified at this moment.

They felt that this wasn’t the power of chaos at all.

It was too easy for the other party to injure them.

They couldn’t defend against it at all.

They weren’t on the same level at all.

This made him terrified.

How could there be such a terrifying existence?

“The Dragon Palace’s strength is seven or eight times stronger than we thought!”

“We’re not their match at all!”

At this moment, sword demon axe roared from the side with blood-red eyes.

He held a heaven creation-level greatsword and kept slashing the sky-covering net.

At this moment, he was also terrified!

Below him, the building of the Dragon Palace was emitting an unparalleled radiance.

The net formed by the radiance completely covered him.

He realized that he could not dodge it at all.

Streams of energy kept covering him.

His attacks couldn’t break through the defense of the net.

He thought that once he broke through to the primal chaos level, he would be able to stand at the peak of the primal chaos.

He would be able to become a peak existence.

However, the scene in front of him made him a little dazed.

This feeling only existed when he was weak.

“Retreat, retreat immediately!”

The chaos-level powerhouse who was locked onto by the Divine Roc of the nine heavens shouted sternly when he saw the situation in front of him.

The Dragon Palace was invincible!

The strength of the Dragon Palace had exceeded their expectations!

“Retreat!”

The elder in the bamboo hat and the others immediately agreed.

Retreat!

Escape!

They were no match for the Dragon Palace at all!

A few chaos-level existences from the evil array faction immediately took out their escape treasures!

“Can we escape?”

Wang Xian looked at them and asked calmly.

At this moment, his palm grabbed forward once again.

The dark figure of the Lord of disaster started to crumble slowly!

He was already severely injured. Now, his body was facing death!

“No!”

The Lord of disaster screamed in pain. All the life force in his body was completely gone!

“What! ?”

“Our Lord of Disaster Is Dead!”

“This… is the dragon palace even stronger than the evil sequence alignment camp?”

At this moment, not far away, the four great dao experts from the spirit kneader and the others looked on in shock.

The Lord of Disaster’s body fell down.

The other three lords used powerful treasures and prepared to instantly retreat!

The expressions of the six of them changed drastically. They also took out their escape treasures and began to flee without any hesitation!

Buzz Buzz Buzz

Buzz Buzz Buzz

They used their treasures and began to teleport away one by one.

Wang Xian did not stop them.

All he needed to do was to remember the auras of these guys.

In addition, there were more than 400 strong cultivators from the evil sequence faction in the land of origin. They were waiting for him to slaughter them!

Buzz

With a wave of his arm, he kept the corpse of the Lord of disaster away.

Following that, a surge of energy enveloped the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens!

“Let’s go to the land of origin!”

Wang Xian instructed the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens!

The next moment, Wang Xian brought him to the base of the Dragon Palace Alliance in an instant.

Boom! Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom! Boom

When they arrived at the base of the Dragon Palace, they could sense a terrifying energy fluctuation in the sky in front of them!

A great war broke out here!
